solution: When a FastAPI wrapper (health_api.py) reimplements logic already in a core module (health.py), schema drift occurs. Fix: have the API layer call the core function directly instead of maintaining duplicate implementations. health_api.py should import and call get_capability_status() from src.core.health, not reimplement the capability checks.
summary: Fix for: SCHP health endpoint schema drift between core module and API layer due to duplicate implementations
